name: Git Repository Opener
description: An ulauncher extension to open your local git repositories with your favorite editor.

preferences.name: Git Repository Opener
preferences.description: The keyword to start the Git Repository Opener extension.

preferences.name: Base search path for repositories
preferences.description: The path under which the repositories should be searched. The use of environment variables is allowed.

preferences.name: Repositories with multiple codebases.
preferences.description: List to multiply repostories into specific paths. Example: "code1:frontend,backend" will split the repository "code1" into 3 items (code1, code1-fronted, code1-backend). Multiple Items will be seperated by ";"

preferences.name: Intellij command
preferences.description: The command to open Intellij. You can use Intellij community or Intellij ultimate.

preferences.name: Visual Studio Code command
preferences.description: The command to open Visual Studio Code. You can use the normal or the insiders version.

preferences.name: PyCharm command
preferences.description: The command to open PyCharm. You can use the community or professional version.
